resources.string: Incase of an emergency, use above map to locate victim...
You are one step away from joining the Student\'s Security service!
FIND OUT ABOUT THE QR TEAM
The SOS Application For Makerere University Students
NEED HELP? Will provide you with help in case of a security threat within the University: Alert the QR!
NEED MEDICAL ATTENTION? Will alert the QR in case you or any other student near you is in need of medical attention: Alert the QR!

8 The MQR application is an SOS(emergency) application meant for Makerere University Students. All service provided through the application is done by the Quick Response Team (QR team).
The QR team is a voluntary security team made up of students.
You can join the QR team and take part in the Students\' Security Service by clicking the button below.
To be a member will require you to take part in all QR Team schedules and activities.
Are you ready to be a member?
